NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: The Supreme Court Of The United States, otherwise know as SCOTUS, is one of the three main branches of our government.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Quickly learn about all the sitting and retired Supreme Court Justices and then go back in time with the interactive timeline navigator!
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Listen to recordings of key arguments fought before SCOTUS and then decide for yourself if you agree with these important rulings.
WELCOME_INTRO: The starting point for your next great Ionic app
